This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Info

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

CFF

Composite

CFF font should not have any composite.

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Info

CFF

Composite

CFF font should not have any composite.

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

CFF

Composite

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Advance Width (zero or negative)

Advance Width (zero or negative)

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx

advance width

Advance width should not be negative or zero.

OK: There is no negative advance width for any glyph in the font.

Pass

hmtx

advance width

OK: There is no negative advance width for any glyph in the font.

hmtx

advance width

OK: There is no negative advance width for any glyph in the font.

Info

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

hmtx

advance

Pull glyphs with advance width zero.

'.null' (ID 1) = '0'.

Info

Advent Pro Medium Regular (AdventPro-Medium.ttf)

hmtx

advance

Pull glyphs with advance width zero.

'.null' (ID 1) = '0'.

Info

hmtx

advance

Pull glyphs with advance width zero.

'.null' (ID 1) = '0'.

Info

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

hmtx

advance

Pull glyphs with advance width zero.

'.null' (ID 1) = '0'.

Index 0

'.notdef' advance width should not be 0.

OK: '.notdef' advance width is 500.

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

post

Index 1

PostScript name should be one of the names:
".null"
"null"
"NULL".

OK: Index 1 = ".null".

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

glyf

Index 1

'.null' shoiuld have no contours.

'.null' has 0 contours.

Error

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx

Index 1

'.null' should have an advance width of 0.

'.null' has an advance width of 458.
If the width matches the original font's index 1 width, it does not need to be changed.

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

post

Index 2

PostScript name should be one of the names:
"nonmarkingreturn"
"CR".

OK: Index 2 = "nonmarkingreturn".

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

glyf

Index 2

'nonmarkingreturn' should have no contours.

OK: 'nonmarkingreturn' has 0 contours.

Error

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx

Index 2

Advance width of 'nonmarkingreturn' should match the space width.

'nonmarkingreturn' advance width '458' does not match the space width '278'.
If the width matches the original font's index 2 width, it does not need to be changed.

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

PostScript name should be "space"

OS/2 table

OS/2 table

Error

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Pass

OS/2

usLastCharIndex

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0xFB04.

Error

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Editable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Editable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Advent Pro Medium Regular (AdventPro-Medium.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Editable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

embedding level: Embedding Level = Editable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Advent Pro SemiBold Regular (AdventPro-SemiBold.ttf)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Advent Pro SemiBold Regular (AdventPro-SemiBold.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Advent Pro SemiBold Regular (AdventPro-SemiBold.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

This font is not a variable font.

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Advent Pro Thin Regular (AdventPro-Thin.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Please verify with spec or Project Manager if uni0000 is required, if so: PLEASE ADD.

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright (c) 2008 Andreas Kalpakidis (hello@inderesting.com), with Reserved Font Name "Advent Pro"'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '20'
'AdventPro-ExtraLight'

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Advent Pro Thin is a trademark of INDE Andreas Kalpakidis.'
but what do think about this
'Advent Pro Thin is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Andreas Kalpakidis' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright (c) 2008 Andreas Kalpakidis (hello@inderesting.com), with Reserved Font Name "Advent Pro"'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '20'
'AdventPro-ExtraLight'

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Advent Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'ExtraLight' = NID 1 'Advent Pro ExtraLight'.

Pass

Advent Pro Thin Regular (AdventPro-Thin.ttf)

Mac NID 6

Pass

Advent Pro Thin Regular (AdventPro-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-Thin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro Thin Regular (AdventPro-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-Thin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro Thin Regular (AdventPro-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Andreas Kalpakidis' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. Advent Pro Thin Regular (AdventPro-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Advent Pro Thin Regular (AdventPro-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Advent Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Thin' = NID 1 'Advent Pro Thin'.

Pass

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Thin'

Pass

Advent Pro Thin Regular (AdventPro-Thin.ttf)

name

Macintosh NID 0 (Mac/Roman/English)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 0, Copyright' (Mac/Roman/English)

Copyright is present.

Pass

It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

'Advent Pro'

Advent Pro Light Regular (AdventPro-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '15'
'AdventPro-Light'

Pass

Advent Pro Light Regular (AdventPro-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro Light Regular (AdventPro-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Current trademark is:

but what do think about this
'Advent Pro Thin is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Advent Pro Light Regular (AdventPro-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Error

name

NID 11 is www.inderesting.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Advent Pro Light Regular (AdventPro-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Andreas Kalpakidis' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. Advent Pro Light Regular (AdventPro-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Advent Pro Light Regular (AdventPro-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Advent Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Advent Pro Light'.

Pass

Advent Pro Light Regular (AdventPro-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

'Advent Pro'

Advent Pro Light Regular (AdventPro-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright (c) 2008 Andreas Kalpakidis (hello@inderesting.com), with Reserved Font Name "Advent Pro"'
MS is: 'Copyright (c) 2008 Andreas Kalpakidis (hello@inderesting.com), with Reserved Font Name "Advent Pro"'

Error

Advent Pro Light Regular (AdventPro-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Advent Pro'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Advent Pro Light'

Error

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Regular'

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'AdventPro-Regular'

Pass

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Advent Pro Thin is a trademark of INDE Andreas Kalpakidis.'
but what do think about this
'Advent Pro Thin is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Andreas Kalpakidis', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.inderesting.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.inderesting.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Andreas Kalpakidis' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

name/OS/2

MS NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Advent Pro'

name

MS NID 4

NID 4 'Advent Pro Regular' ≠ NID 1 'Advent Pro'

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Pass

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'AdventPro-Regular'

Pass

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Advent Pro Thin is a trademark of INDE Andreas Kalpakidis.'
but what do think about this
'Advent Pro Thin is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Andreas Kalpakidis', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.inderesting.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.inderesting.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Andreas Kalpakidis' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

MS is: 'Copyright (c) 2008 Andreas Kalpakidis (hello@inderesting.com), with Reserved Font Name "Advent Pro"'

Advent Pro Medium Regular (AdventPro-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.inderesting.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

name

Advent Pro Medium Regular (AdventPro-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Andreas Kalpakidis' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Advent Pro Medium Regular (AdventPro-Medium.ttf)

name

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Advent Pro Medium Regular (AdventPro-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright (c) 2008 Andreas Kalpakidis (hello@inderesting.com), with Reserved Font Name "Advent Pro"'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Advent Pro Medium'

Advent Pro Medium Regular (AdventPro-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '16'
'AdventPro-Medium'

Pass

Advent Pro Medium Regular (AdventPro-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro Medium Regular (AdventPro-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

'Advent Pro Thin is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. Advent Pro Medium Regular (AdventPro-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Advent Pro Medium Regular (AdventPro-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Advent Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Medium' = NID 1 'Advent Pro Medium'.

Pass

Pass

Pass

Advent Pro SemiBold Regular (AdventPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro SemiBold Regular (AdventPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro SemiBold Regular (AdventPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Andreas Kalpakidis' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Advent Pro SemiBold Regular (AdventPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Advent Pro SemiBold Regular (AdventPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Advent Pro' + 'Space' + NID 17 'SemiBold' = NID 1 'Advent Pro SemiBold'.

Pass

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Advent Pro SemiBold'

Advent Pro SemiBold Regular (AdventPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 17

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'SemiBold'

Pass

Advent Pro SemiBold Regular (AdventPro-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Macintosh NID 0 (Mac/Roman/English)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 0, Copyright' (Mac/Roman/English)

Copyright is present.

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright (c) 2008 Andreas Kalpakidis (hello@inderesting.com), with Reserved Font Name "Advent Pro"'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '10'
'Advent Pro'

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

name

Mac NID 1

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'X, Demi, Xtra, Ex, Extra, Ultra, Sm, Dm, Semi'

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name/OS/2

Mac NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Advent Pro'

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Advent Pro Bold' = NID 1 'Advent Pro' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold'

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.002' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.002'.

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '14'
'AdventPro-Bold'

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'AdventPro-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Advent Pro Thin is a trademark of INDE Andreas Kalpakidis.'
but what do think about this
'Advent Pro Thin is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Andreas Kalpakidis', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.inderesting.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.inderesting.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Andreas Kalpakidis' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Andreas Kalpakidis' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright (c) 2008 Andreas Kalpakidis (hello@inderesting.com), with Reserved Font Name "Advent Pro"'
MS is: 'Copyright (c) 2008 Andreas Kalpakidis (hello@inderesting.com), with Reserved Font Name "Advent Pro"'

Underline Position and Thickness

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-75'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Pass

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Info

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Info

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

kern/GPOS

kern

'kern' table and 'GPOS' kerning.

Font has GPOS kerning and no 'kern' table.
Verify with the spec or PM what is required.

Pass

Vertical Metrics

Vertical Metrics

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1194) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

Info

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

hhea

Vertical Metrics

Pull hhea Metrics

hhea.ascent: 964
hhea.descent: -232
hhea.lineGap: 0

Info

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

Vertical Metrics

Pull OS/2 sTypo Metrics

OS2.sTypoAscender: 962
OS2.sTypoDescender: -232
OS2.sTypoLineGap: 0

Info

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

Vertical Metrics

Pull OS/2 usWin Metrics

OS2.usWinAscent: 962
OS2.usWinDescent: 232

Info

OS/2

xAvgCharWidth

Get 'OS/2' xAvgCharWidth.

xAvgCharWidth = 483.

Info

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

hhea

advanceWidthMax

Get advanceWidthMax.

advanceWidthMax = 1916.

Info

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

hhea

xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax

Get xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax.

xMin: -51
yMin: -218
xMax: 1877
yMax: 948

Pass

OS/2

sTypoAscender

sTypoAscender = '962'.

gasp Table

gasp Table

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

PostScript names

PostScript names

Pass

Advent Pro ExtraLight Regular (AdventPro-ExtraLight.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Advent Pro Thin Regular (AdventPro-Thin.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Advent Pro Light Regular (AdventPro-Light.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Advent Pro Regular (AdventPro-Regular.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Advent Pro Medium Regular (AdventPro-Medium.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Advent Pro SemiBold Regular (AdventPro-SemiBold.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Advent Pro Bold (AdventPro-Bold.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.
